chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
neutral Z IdZ addZ OZ

Premises:
neutral : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> Prop
addZ = fun x1 x2 : Z => match x1 with | OZ => x2 | pos n => addpos x2 n | neg n => addneg x2 n end : Z -> Z -> Z
Inductive Z : Set := OZ : Z | pos : nat -> Z | neg : nat -> Z Arguments pos _%nat_scope Arguments neg _%nat_scope
IdZ = fun _ : Z => True : Z -> Prop
absZ = fun x : Z => match x with | OZ => OZ | pos n | neg n => pos n end : Z -> Z
sgnZ = fun x : Z => match x with | OZ => OZ | pos _ => pos 0 | neg _ => neg 0 end : Z -> Z
succZ = fun x : Z => match x with | OZ => IZ | pos n => pos (S n) | neg 0 => OZ | neg (S m) => neg m end : Z -> Z
predZ = fun x : Z => match x with | OZ => neg 0 | pos 0 => OZ | pos (S m) => pos m | neg n => neg (S n) end : Z -> Z
Inductive Z : Set := OZ : Z | pos : nat -> Z | neg : nat -> Z Arguments pos _%nat_scope Arguments neg _%nat_scope
addZ_commutativity = fun x y : Z => Z_ind (fun x0 : Z => addZ x0 y = addZ y x0) (eq_sym (add_OZ y)) (fun n : nat => nat_ind (fun n0 : nat => addZ (pos n0) y = addZ y (pos n0)) (eq_sym (add_IZ_succZ y)) (fun (n0 : nat) (H : addZ (pos n0) y = addZ y (pos n0)) => eq_ind_r (fun z : Z => z = addZ y (pos (S n0))) (eq_ind_r (fun z : Z => succZ z = addZ y (pos (S n0))) (let H0 : succZ (pos n0) = pos (S n0) := eq_refl in (fun H1 : succZ (pos n0) = pos (S n0) => eq_ind (succZ (pos n0)) (fun z : Z => succZ (addZ y (pos n...
add_OZ : forall x : Z, addZ x OZ = x
addZ_eq1 : forall y : Z, addZ OZ y = y
addZ_associativity = fun x y z : Z => Z_ind (fun x0 : Z => addZ x0 (addZ y z) = addZ (addZ x0 y) z) eq_refl (fun n : nat => nat_ind (fun n0 : nat => addZ (pos n0) (addZ y z) = addZ (addZ (pos n0) y) z) (eq_sym (succ_addZ_l y z)) (fun (n0 : nat) (H : addZ (pos n0) (addZ y z) = addZ (addZ (pos n0) y) z) => eq_ind_r (fun z0 : Z => z0 = addZ (addZ (pos (S n0)) y) z) (eq_ind_r (fun z0 : Z => succZ (addZ (pos n0) (addZ y z)) = addZ z0 z) (eq_ind_r (fun z0 : Z => succZ (addZ (pos n0) (addZ y...
negOZ = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => OZ | S n' => neg n' end : nat -> Z Arguments negOZ _%nat_scope
posOZ = fun n : nat => match n with | 0 => OZ | S n' => pos n' end : nat -> Z Arguments posOZ _%nat_scope
Z_ind : forall P : Z -> Prop, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_rect : forall P : Z -> Type, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_rec : forall P : Z -> Set, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
Z_sind : forall P : Z -> SProp, P OZ -> (forall n : nat, P (pos n)) -> (forall n : nat, P (neg n)) -> forall z : Z, P z
neutral_add : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S), neutral S G Add O -> O = Add O O
is_posn = fun x z : Z => match x with | pos n => match z with | pos m => n = m | _ => False end | _ => False end : Z -> Z -> Prop
addneg = fix addneg (x2 : Z) (n : nat) {struct n} : Z := match n with | 0 => predZ x2 | S n0 => predZ (addneg x2 n0) end : Z -> nat -> Z Arguments addneg _ _%nat_scope
addpos = fix addpos (x2 : Z) (n : nat) {struct n} : Z := match n with | 0 => succZ x2 | S n0 => succZ (addpos x2 n0) end : Z -> nat -> Z Arguments addpos _ _%nat_scope
IZ = pos 0 : Z
add_IZ_succZ : forall x : Z, addZ x IZ = succZ x
addZ_eq4 : forall y : Z, addZ (neg 0) y = predZ y
addZ_eq2 : forall y : Z, addZ (pos 0) y = succZ y
add_mIZ_predZ : forall x : Z, addZ x (neg 0) = predZ x
pred_addZ_l : forall x y : Z, addZ (predZ x) y = predZ (addZ x y)

```coq
unfold neutral, addZ, IdZ, OZ.
intros x; simpl.
rewrite <- add_OZ.
reflexivity.
Qed.```
